title: Getting API access key Through  Introspection query Graphql

activities.message:
Hi @abhiram,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

We do not consider introspection revealing schema definitions to be sensitive information exposure. Our scheme definitions themselves are not sensitive information and we have designed our endpoints to be discoverable via introspection.

Introspection is not something limited to internal use, quite the opposite; it's super useful for external implementers to know how our API/domain works.

As such I'm going to close this out as informational but please feel free to re-open this report if you can provide proof of a specific exploit at New Relic related to this.

Thanks,
Joe
